instanc repres window desktop window manag manag instanc parent built constructor take code displai code argument describ em level em shell instanc parent describ em secondari em em dialog em shell instanc displai on maxim minim normal state ul li instanc mark em maxim em window manag typic resiz fill entir visibl area displai instanc put state resiz even ha style code resiz code longer maxim li li instanc em normal em state maxim minim appear control style constant specifi creat restrict window manag li li instanc ha mark em minim em content client area visibl depend window manag iconifi replac desktop small simplifi represent reloc distinguish area screen hidden combin chang li ul note style support treat em hint em window manag desktop instanc visibl ha ultim control appear behavior decor modal exampl window manag support resiz window assum resiz style even set addit modal style support upgrad more restrict modal style support exampl code primari modal primary_mod code support
